title: Stewart Cheifet, PBS host who chronicled the PC revolution, dies at 87
description: Cheifet produced more than 400 episodes of TV tracing the rise of personal computing.
content: Cheifet produced more than 400 episodes of TV tracing the rise of personal computing.
